snippet: President Bashar al-Assad said it was worth studying a proposal by the United Nations envoy to Syria, Staffan de Mistura, to freeze the conflict in Aleppo, Syria’s largest city.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad says that United Nations proposal for local cease-fire in Aleppo is worth considering.
lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad said it was worth studying a proposal by the United Nations envoy to Syria, Staffan de Mistura, to freeze the conflict in Aleppo, Syria’s largest city.

headline.main: Syrian Leader Says U.N. Cease-Fire Proposal Is Worth Considering
headline.print_headline: Syria: Interest in a Truce Plan
